projects.title: Aegis
projects.description: Aegis is an ambitious computer vision turret controller that leverages YOLO for real-time object detection and face recognition. It promises to set a new standard in automated security solutions.

projects.title: FRC 2025
projects.description: As a core builder and leader for Team 7190, I led development on critical components including main robot design, wiring/electrical, driving, a two stage elevator, and creating motor driven systems. Contributed to mechanical prototyping, drivetrain optimization, and overall project management. I also played a key role in outreach and marketing efforts, enhancing the team's visibility and community engagement.

projects.title: Algoduel
projects.description: Algoduel is a strategic game where you craft an algorithm to control your fighter as they battle against AI opponents, created for Hack Club's High Seas event. It merges coding challenges with engaging gameplay for a unique competitive experience.

projects.title: Capsule
projects.description: Capsule is a time travel themed jouraling application, created for Hack Club's High Seas event. You schedule messages to be sent to your future self. It features a sleek design and a user-friendly interface, making it easy to use.

projects.title: Bloondubs
projects.description: Bloondubs is a web-based game, created for Hack Club's High Seas event. The player navigates a map to collect items and avoid enemies. Built with React and Redux, it features a dynamic map and engaging gameplay mechanics.

projects.title: Pirate-Personality
projects.description: Pirate-Personality is a fun quiz app, created for Hack Club's High Seas event. The app determines which position you would have in a pirate crew. Built with Vue.js, it offers interactive questions and dynamic results.

projects.title: Rollbone
projects.description: Rollbone is a web-based dice roller, created for Hack Club's High Seas event. It allows users to select their odds and roll dice to gain gold, with a firebase powered scoreboard.
